_comment: AD7091 - 12-bit, 1 MSPS SAR ADC from Analog Devices
description: AD7091 12-bit, 1 MSPS SAR ADC, ultra-low power, SPI interface
_comment_V_FS: Full scale voltage, V (VDD range: 2.09V to 5.25V, typical 3.3V or 5V)
_comment_ENOB: Effective number of bits (typical for 12-bit ADC)
_comment_power_consumption_1MSPS: Power consumption at 1 MSPS, W (367 µA × 3V = 1.101 mW at 3V)
_comment_power_consumption_powerdown: Power consumption in power-down mode, W (324 nA × 3V = 0.972 µW at 3V)
_comment_supply_current_1MSPS: Supply current at 1 MSPS, A (367 µA at 3V)
_comment_supply_current_powerdown: Supply current in power-down mode, A (324 nA at 3V)
_comment_max_sclk: Maximum SPI clock frequency, Hz (50 MHz)
_comment_input_range: Input voltage range (0V to VDD, where VDD = 2.09V to 5.25V)
